name: wan-video-viewer-frontend
description: Frontend build tools for WAN Video Matrix Viewer

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:dev-css && npm run build:dev-js
scripts.build:css: postcss frontend/static/css/main.css -o frontend/static/dist/main.min.css --use autoprefixer --use postcss-preset-env --use cssnano
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run serve:dev"
scripts.start: npm run build:dev-css && concurrently "python backend/app.py" "npm run dev"

author: WAN Video Analysis Team
